title: Rudolfs
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Bakery, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Self-service restaurant in the building of Volkshochschule in a bright space. Offers vegan breakfast, lunch and dinner (main course menu changes every Monday). Small salad bar indicates the vegan items. Has coffee and cakes. All costs are charged to a "cash card" during the stay and must be payed at the cashpoint afterwards.
